description: Ensure iframes have a descriptive title attribute.
recommendation: Provide a unique title attribute for each <iframe> to describe its content. (WCAG 2.1 SC 4.1.2)
algorithm: Flags <iframe> elements (and iframe macros) missing a non-empty title attribute.
algorithm_advanced: Checks <iframe> elements (and freemarker iframe macros) for non-empty title attributes.
